channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: WA Diamond League Athletics
channel.desc: Live coverage as some of the biggest superstars in world athletics descend on the Swedish capital, including the return to action of Keely Hodgkinson. The Team GB poster girl has not raced since winning Olympic gold in Paris 2024, and she faces an elite field in the 800m, with the top eight ranked runners all due to take part in Stockholm. A blockbuster battle is also set for the women's 100m, with Britain's Dina Asher-Smith and Daryll Neita facing off against Julien Alfred and Julia Henriksson.
